name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Security Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in **security engineering**, **vulnerability management**, and **detection and response** within diverse environments. Proficient in leading initiatives on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, I leverage my expertise in **Kubernetes**, **AWS EKS**, and infrastructure as code tools like **Terraform** and **Helm** to deliver secure and scalable solutions. My technical skills also encompass **cloud-native observability**, programming languages such as **Go**, **Python**, and **Rust**, and knowledge in **CNAPP**, **CSPM**, and **CIEM** strategies. I have successfully led cross-functional teams, mentored junior engineers, and driven projects focusing on security, user experience, and innovation, while enhancing accessibility and maintaining technical excellence.
